summary: Told in a quasi-documentary style, this companion piece to Soy curiosa azul (1968) deals with topics such as class society, non-violent resistance, sex, relationships, and tourism to Francoist Spain.
cast: Lena Nyman|Vilgot Sjöman|Börje Ahlstedt|Peter Lindgren|Chris Wahlström|Marie Göranzon|Magnus Nilsson|Ulla Lyttkens|Andreas Bellis|Evgeniy Evtushenko|Marianne Johnson|Martin Luther King|Raymond Lundberg|Lena Malmsjö|Christer Oestberg|Mårten Palme|Olof Palme|Bengt Palmers|Tage Sjöborg|Peter Wester|Anders Ek|Lars Hansson|Bo Holmström|Holger Löwenadler|Bertil Norström|Lisbeth Palme|Dora Söderberg|Öllegård Wellton|Ewonne Winblad|Sven Wollter
keywords: politics|male pubic hair|male full frontal nudity|eastern europe|equality
title: Soy curiosa amarillo
